title: Terell's Taste Buds
description: Terell is a fussy eater. He eats the same foods for breakfast, lunch, and dinner every day. On Thanksgiving, Terell realizes none of his favorite foods are on the table. What will he eat? His grandmother knows how to solve the problem. What will she do? Terell's Taste Buds provides the opportunity to introduce story elements. Pictures support the text.
meta: breakfast, dinner, fussy, habits, lunch, taste buds
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand and remember story events
Discriminate Initial and Final Consonant Digraphs : Discriminate initial and final consonant digraph /ch/
Consonant Digraphs : Identify initial and final consonant digraph ch
Exclamation Marks : Identify and use exclamation marks
Alphabetizing : Understand how to alphabetize words to the second letter

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
